steps.name: build svg-only action
steps.run:
yarn install --frozen-lockfile
yarn build:demo
mv packages/demo/dist/* svg-only/

message.text: Actions job or workflow does not limit the permissions of the GITHUB_TOKEN. Consider setting an explicit permissions block, using the following as a minimal starting point: {{contents: read}}

steps.name: build and publish the docker image
update action.yml to point to the newly created docker image

steps.run:

yarn build:action

message.text: Actions job or workflow does not limit the permissions of the GITHUB_TOKEN. Consider setting an explicit permissions block, using the following as a minimal starting point: {{contents: read}}

steps.name: build and publish the docker image
update action.yml to point to the newly created docker image
build svg-only action
steps.run:
yarn install --frozen-lockfile
yarn build:action
rm -r svg-only/dist
mv packages/action/dist svg-only/dist

steps.name: push new build, tag version and push
steps.run:
VERSION=${{ github.event.inputs.version }}

git add package.json svg-only/dist action.yml
git commit -m "📦 $VERSION"
git tag v$VERSION
git push origin master --tags

if [[ "$VERSION" =~ ^\d+\.\d+\.\d+$ ]] then
  git tag --force v$( echo VERSION | cut -d. -f 1-1 )
  git tag --force v$( echo VERSION | cut -d. -f 1-2 )
  git push origin --tags --force
  echo ::set-output name=prerelease::false
else 
  echo ::set-output name=prerelease::true
fi

message.text: Actions job or workflow does not limit the permissions of the GITHUB_TOKEN. Consider setting an explicit permissions block, using the following as a minimal starting point: {{contents: read}}

steps.name: build and publish the docker image
update action.yml to point to the newly created docker image
build svg-only action
steps.run:
yarn install --frozen-lockfile
yarn build:action
rm -r svg-only/dist
mv packages/action/dist svg-only/dist

steps.name: push new build, tag version and push
steps.run:
VERSION=${{ github.event.inputs.version }}

git config --global user.email "bot@platane.me"
git config --global user.name "release bot"
git add package.json svg-only/dist action.yml
git commit -m "📦 $VERSION"
git tag v$VERSION
git push origin master --tags

if [[ "$VERSION" =~ ^\ d+\.\d+\.\d+$ ]] then
  git tag --force v$( echo VERSION | cut -d. -f 1-1 )
  git tag --force v$( echo VERSION | cut -d. -f 1-2 )
  git push origin --tags --force
  echo ::set-output name=prerelease::false
else 
  echo ::set-output name=prerelease::true
fi

git config --global user.email "bot@platane.me"
git config --global user.name "release bot"
git add package.json svg-only/dist action.yml
git commit -m "📦 $VERSION"
git tag v$VERSION
git push origin master --tags

if [[ "$VERSION" =~ ^[0-9]+\ .[0-9]+\.[0-9]+$ ]]; then

  git push origin --tags --force
  echo ::set-output name=prerelease::false

message.text: Actions job or workflow does not limit the permissions of the GITHUB_TOKEN. Consider setting an explicit permissions block, using the following as a minimal starting point: {{contents: read}}

steps.name: build and publish the docker image
update action.yml to point to the newly created docker image
build svg-only action
steps.run:
yarn install --frozen-lockfile
yarn build:action
rm -r svg-only/dist
mv packages/action/dist svg-only/dist

steps.name: push new build, tag version and push
steps.run:
VERSION=${{ github.event.inputs.version }}

git config --global user.email "bot@platane.me"
git config --global user.name "release bot"
git add package.json svg-only/dist action.yml
git commit -m "📦 $VERSION"
git tag v$VERSION
git push origin main --tags

if [[ "$VERSION" =~ ^[0-9]+\ .[0-9]+\.[0-9]+$ ]]; then
  git tag v$( echo $VERSION | cut -d. -f 1-1 )
  git tag v$( echo $VERSION | cut -d. -f 1-2 )
  git push origin --tags --force
  echo ::set-output name=prerelease::false
else 
  echo ::set-output name=prerelease::true
fi

version.description:
New version for the release
If the version is in format <major>.<minor>.<patch> a new release is emitted.
Otherwise for other format ( for example <major>.<minor>.<patch>-beta.1 ), a prerelease is emitted.

steps.name: build and publish the docker image
update action.yml to point to the newly created docker image
build svg-only action
steps.run:
yarn install --frozen-lockfile
yarn build:action
rm -r svg-only/dist
mv packages/action/dist svg-only/dist

steps.name: push new build, tag version and push
steps.run:
VERSION=${{ github.event.inputs.version }}

git config --global user.email "bot@platane.me"
git config --global user.name "release bot"
git add package.json svg-only/dist action.yml
git commit -m "📦 $VERSION"
git tag v$VERSION
git push origin main --tags

if [[ "$VERSION" =~ ^[0-9]+\ .[0-9]+\.[0-9]+$ ]]; then
  git tag v$( echo $VERSION | cut -d. -f 1-1 )
  git tag v$( echo $VERSION | cut -d. -f 1-2 )
  git push origin --tags --force
  echo "prerelease=false" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT
else 
  echo "prerelease=true" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT
fi
